product_name: Quiksilver Fish Tail Hybrid Board Shorts - Men's
long_description: The men's Quiksilver Fish Tail Hybrid Board Shorts are made for summertime adventures around water thanks to their quick-drying and very stretchy fabric. Stretchy polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you having fun in and out of the water. Diamond pattern on interior of fabric reduces contact with skin and eliminates rashing. Side entry pocket and side rip-and-stick pocket store small items. The Quiksilver Fish Tail Hybrid Board Shorts feature a traditional board shorts lace-up fly. Hand wash in cold water.
short_description: The men's Quiksilver Fish Tail Hybrid Board Shorts are made for summertime adventures around water thanks to their quick-drying and very stretchy fabric.
